info.title: Active.com Search API v2
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs. This API supports keyword search against Active.com assets, result restriction to a particular location, and result filtering based on asset metadata. For additional query attribute, check out: http://developer.active.com/docs/v2_activity_api_search.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Search our database of events and activities using...
get.description: Search our database of events and activities using the parameters below.

parameters.name: near
parameters.description: A string naming a place that can be geocoded. If the near string is not geocodable, returns a failed geocoded error. Example: near=San%20Diego,CA,US

parameters.name: lat_lon
parameters.description: A location specified as a latitude and longitude separated by a comma. Example: lat_lon=43.2,-118

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box specified by the lat/lng of the northwest and southeast corners separated by a semi-colon. Example: bbox=40.73,-74.1;40.717,-73.-99

parameters.name: geo_points
parameters.description: A list of lat/long pairs separated by a url encoded semi-colon. This limits the result list to assets that fall within the polygon of points. Example: geo_points=40,-70%3B30,-80%3B20,-90

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The search radius as specified in miles. Example: radius=50

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Matches assets by city name. Example: city=san+diego

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Matches assets by state or province code. Example: state=CA

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Matches assets by zip or postal code. Example: zip=92101

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Matches assets by country name. Example: country=United%20States

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search by keywords. The free-form query to search (equivalent to what a user types in the search box on search.active.com). Example: query=marathon

parameters.name: kids
parameters.description: Returns only results for kids events. Setting to 'true' returns kids events with ACTIVEkids.com URLs.

parameters.name: current_page
parameters.description: The current page of results. Defaults to 1. Example: current_page=1

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return. Defaults to 10. Example: per_page=50

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort order of the results. The possible values are date_asc, date_desc, and distance. If sort is not specified, results are sort by relevance to the query param. Distance can only be used when either the near or lat_lon parameters are specified and sorts the results according to distance from the specified location smallest to largest. Example: sort=date_asc

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description: A comma delimited string containing the facet counts to return. It will bring all values for a particular field that show up in your result set.  In the example below, you will get a break down of all the category names present in your search for tinker bell half marathon. Example: query=tinker%20bell%20half%20marathon&facets=categoryName

parameters.name: facet_values
parameters.description: Returns facet counts for the specified field values. The value of the param is the field name followed by a comma delimited list of values. The field name and values are separated by a pipe It will bring back the facet count for a specific field and its value.  In the example below, you will get the total count of assets that have a category name of event for your search of tinker bell half marathon. Example: query=tinker%20bell%20half%20marathon&facet_values=categoryName:event

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Matches assets by category name. List of categories can be found here: http://api.amp.active.com/v2/assets/categories

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Matches assets by topic name. List of topics can be found here: http://api.amp.active.com/v2/assets/topics

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Limits results to assets with a start date in the given range. See http://developer.active.com/docs/v2_activity_api_search#ranges for accepted formats

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Limits results to assets with an end date in the given range. See http://developer.active.com/docs/v2_activity_api_search#ranges for accepted formats

parameters.name: cb
parameters.description: JSONP callback parameter. This defines the delegated method to execute when the call is returned.

parameters.name: exclude_children
parameters.description: Removes children assets from the results list. Valid values are true or false. If the parameter is not present, all assets will be returned in the results list.

parameters.name: exists
parameters.description: Filters results to assets that have a value for the specified field(s). The value of the param is a comma-delimited of fields. Example: exists=asset.authorName

parameters.name: not_exists
parameters.description: Filters results to assets that do not have a value for the specified field(s). The value of the param is a comma-delimited of fields. Example: not_exists=asset.authorName
